install.name: System - Ninjaboard Metatags
install.author: Jeff Channell
install.description: This native Joomla 1.5 plugin automatically generates description meta tags and title for Ninjaboard. Original module created by Shikle (admin@joomlame.com) for Agora.

param.name: separator
param.label: Separator
param.description: This is the character that separates your page titles. For example, forum title from agora title. By default it is a pipe - but you can change it to whatever you like. When saving some characters Joomla adds backslashes to 'escape' them - they shouldn't appear in the actual title.

param.name: desclength
param.label: Max. metadesc length
param.description: Characters length to truncate text for metadescription output.

param.name: maintitle
param.label: Ninjaboard main page Title
param.description: Enter Title for Ninjaboard main page.

param.name: maindescription
param.label: Ninjaboard main page MetaDesc
param.description: Enter Metadescription for Ninjaboard main page. It will be truncated at max. from above setting.

param.name: mainkeywords
param.label: Ninjaboard main page keywords
param.description: Enter keywords for Ninjaboard main page. Comma separated.

param.name: categorieskw
param.label: Categories id and keywords
param.description: Enter categoryid|categorykeywords'Press enter'categoryid2|categorykeywords2'Press enter'...and so on

param.name: forums
param.label: Forums id and description
param.description: Enter forumid|forumdescription'Press enter'forumid2|forumdescription2'Press enter'...and so on

param.name: forumskw
param.label: Forums id and keywords
param.description: Enter categoryid|forumkeywords'Press enter'forumid2|forumkeywords2'Press enter'...and so on

param.name: listexclude
param.label: List of words to exclude from topic keywords
param.description: Enter the words, comma separated, you want to exclude form topic's keywords

param.name: goldwords
param.label: Lios of Gold Words
param.description: Enter the words, comma separated, you want to include in topic's keywords if it appears at least one time.

param.name: mindensity
param.label: Minimum density
param.description: Minimum density to include a word

param.name: minlength
param.label: Minimum length
param.description: Minimum length of a word in order to be included as keyword
